com.fujitsu.xml.xlink.dataset
Interface DocumentHashtable

public interface DocumentHashtable

Interface that provides a document information table.
A node is mapped with an absolute URI used as a key.
If a local file name is specified as a system identifier instead of an absolute URI, the current directory at the call is used as the basic directory and the local file name is converted to an absolute URI.

Method Detail

get

public Node get(java.lang.String uri)
The node mapped with the specified URI is obtained.
Parameters:
uri - URI.
Returns:
The node mapped with the URI is returned.
If no node is mapped with the URI or the mapped URI is null, null is returned.

size

public int size()
The number of registered URIs is obtained.
Returns:
The number of registered URIs is returned.

containsKey

public boolean containsKey(java.lang.String uri)
Whether a node is registered with the specified URI is judged.
Parameters:
uri - URI to be judged.
Returns:
The judgment result is returned.
true is returned when a node is registered with the URI; otherwise, false is returned.

keys

public java.util.Enumeration keys()
The list of registered URIs is obtained.
URIs can be fetched sequentially by using the Enumeration method.
Returns:
The list of registered URIs is returned.

elements

public java.util.Enumeration elements()
The list of registered nodes is obtained.
Nodes can be fetched sequentially by using the Enumeration method.
Returns:
The list of registered nodes is returned.
